name: OnPlayerStreamOut
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a player is streamed out from some other player's client.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player who has been destreamed.

params_body.name: forplayerid
params_body.description: The player who has destreamed the other player.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_cb:
OnPlayerStreamIn: Called when a player streams in for another player.
 OnActorStreamOut: Called when an actor is streamed out by a player.
 OnVehicleStreamOut: Called when a vehicle streams out for a player.
